thread.title: Drake and Jennifer Lopez Spend New Year's Eve Together at His Las Vegas Show
thread.title_full: Drake and Jennifer Lopez Spend New Year's Eve Together at His Las Vegas Show

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Drake and Jennifer Lopez Spend New Year's Eve Together at His Las Vegas Show
text:
The "newest couple" in the music world unsurprisingly spent New Year's Eve together. Last week Jennifer Lopez announced she was backing out of her Miami performance for the big night citing she needed “personal and family time." Turns out she just wanted to spend the night with the 6 God as J-Lo was spotted joining Drake at his Las Vegas show at Hakkasan nightclub, further fueling the romance rumors.
Rumors of a DraLo romance began circulating in December, after Drake attended not one, but two of Jennifer’s concerts in Las Vegas, before inviting her to a private dinner party. That's not all, Drizzy has been posting pics on his personal Instagram account of the two of them getting cozy. And just a couple of days ago, a clip of the pair sharing a kiss in a winter wonderland-themed prom .
Click here to view full gallery at Hypebeast.com
